meanings.definition: The state or condition of not being a member.
meanings.sent1: Many people prefer nonmemberships because they enjoy their independence.
meanings.sent2: The nonmemberships at the club have been increasing steadily over the years.
meanings.sent3: The nonmemberships in the group chat felt like they were part of a secret club.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmemberships in various organizations allowed her to see things from a different perspective.
meanings.sent5: The nonmemberships in the team made it challenging to coordinate group activities.

meanings.definition: The fees or dues paid by those who are not members.
meanings.sent1: The nonmemberships for the event were surprisingly affordable.
meanings.sent2: She had to budget carefully to cover all her nonmemberships for different services.
meanings.sent3: Paying nonmemberships sometimes felt like contributing to a club she didn't belong to.
meanings.sent4: His wallet felt lighter after settling all his nonmemberships for the month.
meanings.sent5: The nonmemberships added up quickly, making it hard to keep track of expenses.
